name: Spite: Crowstorm
description:
Summoned by a ritual, you must destroy the hordes infesting the swamp. Slash, screech, and call upon crow storms to lay waste to your enemies.

Spite: Crowstorm is a student game made in 14 weeks by Safety First at The Game Assembly, Malmö.

Programming:

  • Neo Nemeth
  • Niklas Fredriksson
  • Simon Igelström
  • Zoe Thysell
  • Erik Ljungman
  • Semi Asani
  • Joakim Larsson

Animation:

  • Jack Thell Malmberg
  • Elias Runelid
  • Tanya Bengtsson

Graphics:

  • Victor Ek
  • Mirjam Hildahl
  • Philip Tingberg
  • Daniel Gryningstjerna
  • William Holster

Technical Art:

  • Frode Ödéhn
  • Malte Hedenström
  • Sara Ekstam

Level Design:

  • Mina Mirhosseini
  • Tilde Persson
  • Christoffer Carlsvärd
